excerpt: "Intel, Amazon AWS, IBM, Qualcomm, and UIUC researchers have been collaborating over a proposed \"Tensor LLVM Extensions\" (TLX) to make this open-source compiler infrastructure more suitable for targeting AI accelerators and other emerging classes of hardware."
